title: Toilet Chronicles
description: You find yourself in a public restroom . You explore the place and when you get inside of the empty cabin a guy next to your stall askes for some toilet paper. After giving him what he wants, he slides you a note with the message: “STAY IN THE CABIN”. When you get out of the cabin, you notice that the escape door is gone Now you have to find out if that guy trapped you, or is he trapped with you?
